thread.title: Cardiff road re-opened after serious car crash
thread.title_full: Cardiff road re-opened after serious car crash | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Cardiff road re-opened after serious car crash
text:
Penarth Road in Cardiff has been re-opened following a serious car crash.
The incident happened late on Saturday evening. Credit: Andy Collinson/ITV Wales The incident happened late on Saturday evening and two vehicles were involved.
Police confirmed that both drivers and one passenger suffered minor injuries.
Last updated Sun 18 Oct 2015 Travel Wales Cardiff
